about_the_game:
Step into the enchanting world of Adaloria, where epic tales are yours to craft and destinies are shaped by your choices. Adaloria is not just a game; it's an immersive journey into a medieval fantasy realm teeming with life, intrigue, and adventure. Your only goal: survive and thrive in a world rife with warring factions, perilous monsters, and captivating characters, each with their own dreams and motives.

Key Features:
Unparalleled Freedom: Adaloria is a sprawling, open-world experience where you are unburdened by a linear main story. The choice is yours: become a cunning thief, a shrewd trader, a silent assassin, or aspire to construct a flourishing colony that challenges the very fabric of this mesmerizing world.


Dynamic Storytelling: Your journey through Adaloria is defined by your choices. Every decision you make, every alliance you forge, and every moral crossroads you encounter shapes your character's fate and the world around you. No two playthroughs are alike.

A World in Conflict: Dive into a realm marred by warring factions, each vying for power and dominance. Navigate the intricate web of politics and intrigue, where loyalty is a double-edged sword, and betrayal lurks around every corner.


Monstrous Challenges: Beyond the strife of human conflict, Adaloria is home to mythical creatures and treacherous beasts. Engage in epic battles and face off against formidable adversaries as you explore the untamed wilds.

Rich Characters: Encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own dreams, fears, and hidden agendas. Forge alliances, uncover secrets, and immerse yourself in the intricacies of their lives.

Your Legend Awaits: Shape your legacy and let your legend be written in the annals of Adaloria's history. Will you be remembered as a hero, a cunning schemer, or a conqueror of lands?

Join us in Adaloria and embark on an unforgettable journey where your choices become the cornerstone of a living, breathing world. Explore, survive, and thrive in a medieval fantasy realm like no other. The fate of Adaloria is in your hands.

Are you ready to carve your legend? The adventure awaits!

content_descriptors.notes:
In our game, we aim to provide a rich and immersive experience while being mindful of mature content. While we do not depict explicit sexual acts or graphic violence, Adaloria does contain some elements that players should be aware of:

Violence: Adaloria is set in a medieval fantasy world with warring factions and dangerous creatures. There is combat and violence present, but it is not excessively graphic or gratuitous.

Sensitivity to Violence: We do not depict graphic or gratuitous violence, and we do not include depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm in the game.

Mature Themes: Adaloria does explore mature themes such as political intrigue, moral ambiguity, and the consequences of one's choices. However, we do so without explicit content.

Player Choices: The game's storyline is driven by player choices, and you have the agency to decide how your character interacts with the world. You can choose to engage in morally complex situations or avoid them, as your decisions shape your character's path.

We prioritize a respectful and responsible approach to storytelling, ensuring that Adaloria can be enjoyed by a wide audience. If you have any specific concerns about content or would like further clarification, please feel free to contact our support team or refer to our content guidelines. Your enjoyment and comfort in our game are important to us.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows
  • Processor: Dual-core 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: An open world, free roaming, medieval fantasy realm. Survive and expand your own settlements amidst warring factions, dangerous monsters, and diverse characters. Choose your path: thief, trader, farmer, assassin, or colony builder!
